title.narrative: QUALITY EDUCATION

description.narrative: The quality of teaching / learning and retention are improved in basic education and grant the availability of textbooks and teaching and learning materials, which contributes to Learning And Child-Friendly Schools, Learning Outcomes, Skills Development. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Quality of Education learnings and coordination are strengthened.

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The quality of teaching / learning and retention are improved in basic education and grant the availability of textbooks andteaching and learning materials

description.narrative: With UNICEF support to improve the quality of learning, training modules for educational supervisors are available, and 88 educational supervisors have been trained in their use.The Comoros was able, in a more difficult context than 2020, to keep schools open for 7 months instead of 5 ;like the previous year. Social measures implemented in all public schools have helped keep children in schools.The harsh economic context did not prevent families from enrolling their children. This was made possible by the support given to schools by the Ministry of Education and its partners. | Status:Partially met | As-of Date:11/01/2022
